cards.name: Winterfell Kennel Master
cards.text: Challenges Action: If you control a participating [stark] character, kneel a Direwolf character or a character with a Direwolf attachment to have it participate in the current challenge on your side. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Winterfell Castle
cards.text: During a [military] or [power] challenge in which you control 2 or more unique participating [stark] characters, each of those characters gets +2 STR.

cards.name: Lady-in-Waiting
cards.text: Lady-in-Waiting may be marshaled as a duplicate (at no cost) on a Lady character you own and control.

cards.name: Lady Sansa's Rose
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a Knight character that is attacking or defending alone, that character gains 1 power. (3 power instead if you control a Lady character.) (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Unsworn Apprentice
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Challenges Action: Unsworn Apprentice gains a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Brandon's Gift
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal a Builder character, reduce the cost of the next [thenightswatch] card you marshal this phase by 1. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

cards.name: Royal Entourage
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After you lose an [intrigue] challenge, kneel Royal Entourage.
cards.flavor: The visitors poured through the castle gates in a river of gold and silver and polished steel, three hundred strong, a pride of bannermen and knights, of sworn swords and freeriders.

cards.name: In the Name of Your King!
cards.text: Play only during a [military] challenge in which you are the defending player. Action: Kneel your faction card to end this challenge with no winner or loser. Until the end of the phase, you cannot initiate [military] challenges.

cards.name: Brothel Madame
cards.text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a player. That player may give you 1 gold from his or her gold pool. Until the end of the phase, if that player has not given you gold this phase, he or she cannot initiate [military] challenges against you.

cards.name: Wardens of the West
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, pay 2 gold to have the losing opponent choose and discard 2 cards from his or her hand.

cards.name: The Reader
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which a unique [greyjoy] character is participating, either: draw 1 card, or discard the top 3 cards from each opponent's deck. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2011 European Joust Champion, Mart√≠ Foz Hernandez.

cards.name: Raiding Longship
cards.text: Challenges Action: If you are the first player, kneel Raiding Longship to choose a defending character without attachments. That character does not contribute its STR to this challenge.

cards.name: Rakharo
cards.text: While you control another Bloodrider character, Rakharo gains intimidate. Reaction: After a character is killed to satisfy claim during a challenge you initiated, Rakharo gains 1 power.
cards.flavor: "As you say, I do, blood of my blood."

cards.name: Crown of Gold
cards.text: Terminal. Attached character gains the King trait. Attached character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

cards.name: Nymeria Sand
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose an opponent's character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice, and each Sand Snake character you control gains that challenge icon. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: In Doran's Name
cards.text: Action: Kneel your faction card to gain X gold. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.

cards.name: Syrio Forel
cards.text: Stealth. Challenges Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a [military] icon and stealth. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Shadowblack Lane
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, kneel your faction card to search the top 10 cards of your deck for an in-faction event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Trading with the Pentoshi
cards.text: When Revealed: Each opponent gains 3 gold. (Cannot be canceled.)

cards.name: Political Disaster
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player chooses up to 2 locations he or she controls. Each location not chosen is discarded from play.
